azurerm_management_lock.description: Manages a Management Lock which is scoped to a Subscription, Resource Group or Resource.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Management Lock. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scope.description: Specifies the scope at which the Management Lock should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

lock_level.description: Specifies the Level to be used for this Lock. Possible values are `CanNotDelete` and `ReadOnly`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

notes.description: Specifies some notes about the lock. Maximum of 512 characters. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the Management Lock

create.description: Used when creating the Management Lock.

update.description: Used when updating the Management Lock.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Management Lock.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Management Lock.
